description.raw:
Before gazebo6, we were using the same sdformat formula for all versions of gazebo. Also, the gazebo dependencies were installed from the `gazebo.rb` formula. Now, gazebo6 requires sdformat3, so I added detection for the gazebo major version, so that it will install dependencies for the corresponding `gazeboN.rb` formula.

This requires an extra workspace symlink, since the source code is initially in `${WORKSPACE}/gazebo`, but the next script will expect it to be in `${WORKSPACE}/gazeboN`.

This requires an extra workspace symlink, since the source code is initially in ${WORKSPACE}/gazebo, but the next script will expect it to be in ${WORKSPACE}/gazeboN.
